column3: Rearranged if-conditions as suggested offline by @morcos.\n
@ryanofsky The 60cf51c patch looks like a separate bugfix, not strictly related to tests. Would you mind submitting this as another pull request?\n
Does this comment still apply, considering that you switched from `0` to `getblockcount`?\n

This change might make the problem less likely to happen, but it still could happen. If none of the nodes in the set are fully synced when the `sync_blocks` call is made, then `maxheight` will be set to some height less than the final stable height, and the call could return before the nodes are all synced.\n
